item.title: ‘I’m young, debt-free and happy-go-lucky’: My boyfriend has $45,000 in debts, two houses, two kids and pays child support. Is he a safe bet to marry?
item.description: “Lately, we’ve been discussing the future, including marriage.”

item.title: My friend declared bankruptcy. Can creditors still go after him for child support, back taxes and student debt?
item.description: “Most of those old debts are credit-card debts.”

item.title: Stocks ride to best month in a year as ‘Red Sweep’ unleashes ‘animal spirits’
item.description: By almost any measure, November has been a blockbuster month for U.S. stocks.

item.title: Oil prices suffer November drop as Middle East fears ease, OPEC+ delays meeting
item.description: Oil futures fell Friday, booking weekly and monthly losses after a cease-fire this week between Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah helped soothe remaini...

item.title: 10-year Treasury yields falls to 5-week low as traders return after Thanksgiving
item.description: Bond yields fell Friday as the market re-opened following the Thanksgiving break.
